column1: # C-GEM Seasonal Calibration Targets: Mekong Delta
# This file defines time-series observations for seasonal calibration.
# The optimizer will find parameters that satisfy BOTH dry and wet season.
# Time_Day: Days from simulation start (use StartDate in case_config.txt)
#   - Nguyen et al. (2008): Dry season salinity intrusion 40-60 km
#   - MRC Water Quality Database: Seasonal patterns
# Dry season - ETM forms due to tidal trapping
